name: 2WAYZ Heavy Duty Garden Hose Connector with On/Off Switch - Water Flow Control Adapter for Outdoor Use - Durable Brass Fitting with Hose Valve Shut-Off Handle for Quick Adjustments
short_description: Quick Installation: Attach the garden hose connector to any outdoor faucet or hose with a simple twist; no tools needed; ensures a reliable, no-leak fit for convenient watering
Leak-Proof Seal: Designed with durable PVC fittings, this 11x6x12.5 inches water shut off valve prevents drips and leaks; helps conserve water while maintaining steady pressure for outdoor use
Easy Flow Control: The ergonomic handle on the hose shut off valve allows precise water regulation with a smooth turn; no stiff knobs, making garden watering and cleaning effortless
Universal Compatibility: Works with most standard hoses, sprinklers, and hose adapters; quickly switch between a water hose nozzle or irrigation system without disconnecting
Built to Last: Made for all-weather durability, this 0° straight hose valve shut off withstands high pressure, extreme temperatures, and outdoor conditions for reliable long-term performance

name: EBH Brass Garden Hose Splitter, 3 Way High Flow Outdoor Faucet Splitter,Full Flow 3-Way Brass Heavy Duty Hose Splitter With 3 Long Metal Handle and Individual On/Off Valve。
short_description: Spout design: full flow spout for increased water supply. The spout is downward vertical, gravity keeps it connected vertically to the hose, feeder or other fittings, allowing multiple hoses to be connected at the same time, ensuring maximum efficiency for a variety of watering tasks to meet your garden's daily needs.

VERSATILE COMPATIBILITY: Made of high quality brass material and sturdy metal large handle construction, the elongated handle uses an ergonomic design to control the on/off valve with ease, compatible with all North American standard 3/4-inch faucets, garden hose fittings, and watering fixtures for long term stable operation and water resistance.
Large Diverter: This diverter has been fully designed and upgraded to increase water flow, the tee outlet GHT 3/4 inch male threads have grown to 0.43inch and the height has increased by 3.89inch.
Package Contents:1 x brass high flow hose diverter, 3 silicone gaskets, 1 x duct tape and different color screw hole covers that can easily instruct the family which color to turn on/off.
HIGH QUALITY SERVICE: If there is any quality problem, please contact our service, EBH team provides exchange and refund service.
product_description: EBH Brass Garden Hose Splitter, 3 Way High Flow Outdoor Faucet Splitter,Full Flow 3-Way Brass Heavy Duty Hose Splitter With 3 Long Metal Handle and Individual On/Off Valve。

name: 2 Pack Garden Hose Shut Off Valve - Extended Handle - 3/4" Heavy Duty Solid Brass Hose Connector Water Shut Off Valve Hose Shutoff Valve with 4 Pcs Hose Washers
short_description: Durable Material: Our garden hose shut off valve are made from high-quality solid brass, resistant to corrosion, ensuring long-lasting performance, allowing quick and effortless flow control.

Easy Operation: Featuring an extended handle design, these hose shutoff valve offer more ease of use compared to others, allowing for effortless attachment and detachment without straining your hands.

Convenient Installation: The octagonal design of the valve allows for easy installation with either tools or by hand, providing flexibility and convenience for all users, whether you are a gardening novice or an experienced professional.
Standard Size Compatibility: These water shut off valve fit most standard 3/4 GHT garden hoses and accessories, perfect for all your gardening equipment, hose reel, connectors, spigot.

Leak-Proof Assurance: Each package includes washers that guarantee a tight fit, eliminating the risk of leaks and ensuring a seamless connection every time you use. Rest assured to use with our reliable hose connectors!
product_description: Product Features Fit any 3/4-inch garden hose threaded watering equipment and most types of garden hose connectors, and faucets. Heavy duty, high quality brass material, can be used for a long time. Extended handle. Octagonal design. Leak Proof. Attention: It contains Pb. In fact, All Brass contains Pb more or less. If you mind Pb, please buy other material.

name: Shut Off Ball Valve 1/2 Inch, SUNGATOR 1/2 Inch Ball Valve, Push-to-Connect Water Shutoff, Easily Match to Pipe using Red and Blue Handle, No Lead Brass Fittings for PEX Pipe, Copper, CPVC, Pack of 2
short_description: 【APPROVED TO USE】: SUNGATOR 1/2" shut off valves are certified and listed to ASSE 1061, NSF/ANSI 61; SUNGATOR push pex fittings all meet UPC, cUPC requirements. Lead Free brass is safe for drinking water and hydronic heating water distribution.

【EASY INSTALLATION】: Complete installs faster and safer than traditional methods with SUNGATOR push shut off valves and ease of use reduces installation errors as pushfit plumbing fittings completely eliminates the need to solder, crimp, glue, thread or fabricate in any forms; Just push and lock the pipe to get the seamless performance.

【VERSATILE APPLICATIONS】: Whether you are repairing a water line, installing a water heater, remodeling a home or plumbing a system in a new construction job, SUNGATOR water shut off valves are compatible with a range of different end connections, joining any combination of PEX, copper, CPVC pipe.

【LONG LASTING】: SUNGATOR pushfit ball valves are made of high-quality brass that is an abrasion resistant material for use in prevention and protection of fittings against corrosion, scratches, dulling and other damage after use. It is a perfect material for pipe fitting system as it can withstand rated up to 200 °F and 200 PSI and long period of wear and tear.
【PACKAGE INCLUDES】: Pushfit 1/2 Inch Ball Valve with Red Handle (1 PC); Pushfit 1/2 Inch Ball Valve with Blue Handle (1 PC); 1/2 Inch Disconnect Clip (1 PC).

name: Stop Valves, 1/2" × 3/8" Angle Stop Valve, 1/2" Nominal (5/8" OD Comp.) Angle Input, 3/8" OD Compression Output, 1/4 Turn, Chrome Plated Brass for Kitchen, Faucet, Toilet Valves
short_description: 【Angle Stop Valve】- Package includes 1 pack 1/2" nominal (5/8" OD Comp.) × 3/8" OD compression angle stop valve with 1/4 turn on/off. It is widely used in plumbing systems, our angle stop valve is perfect for both residential and commercial use.

【Premium Material】- Male thread angle stop valve is made of chrome plated brass body with ABS handle, which is waterproof, durable, good corrosion resistance, heat resistance healthy and safe. This valve is certified with NSF/ANSI 61 and UPC, that comply with drinking water standard.

【Easy to Connect】- 1/2" nominal inlet is very easy to connect with 1/2" stainless steel bellow, braided hose and 1/2" NPT female thread copper pipe. 3/8" OD compression outlet is easy to connect with 3/8" stainless steel braided hose and 3/8" copper pipe.

【Easy to Install】- This shutoff valve can be easily installed without special tools, crimping, glue, or soldering needed, it can be installed in wet lines. It is very easy to install on the pipe supply lines for kitchen, bathroom, toilet, touring car, faucets, dishwashers, and ice makers.

【Perfect for Use】- Angle stop valve is designed to control and shut off water flow to fixtures or appliances for maintenance and repair. It is perfect for working in tight spaces. You don't need to turn off the entire household water supply when maintenance is required.
product_description: Specifications: Item Name: 1/2" nominal (5/8" OD Comp.) × 3/8" OD compression angle stop valve Item Specification: 1/2" nominal (5/8" OD Comp.) × 3/8" OD compression Item Material: Chrome plated brass body, ABS handle Item Color: Silver Package Weight: 4.8oz Package List: 1 pack 1/2" × 3/8" stop valve

short_description: EASTMAN MULTI-TURN STOP VALVE: Angled shut-off valve is designed to control water flow to household plumbing fixtures and allows for the stop of water at the plumbing fixture without turning off water to the entire home

SPECS: This multi-turn stop valve is equipped with a 5/8 inch OD compression x 3/8 inch OD compression nut and sleeve, and can withstand a working pressure of 125 PSI
product_description: Simplify your plumbing and home improvement projects with the Eastman multi-turn angle stop valve. This Eastman multi-turn stop valve is designed to control water flow to household plumbing fixtures and allows for the stop of water at the plumbing fixture without turning off water to the entire home. Stop valve fittings feature a leakproof performance with Teflon seats and a high-performance celcon stem to provide a watertight seal. The multi-turn stop valve has a 5/8 inch OD Comp x 3/8 inch OD Comp connection nut and sleeve, and can withstand a working pressure of 125 PSI. Certified by the Uniform Plumbing Code (UPC), angle stops are compatible with bathroom faucets, toilets, kitchen sinks, dishwashers, and ice makers.performance celcon stem to provide a watertight seal. name: 10 Pack Angle Stop Valve,1/4 Turn Water Shut Off Valves,1/2" Nominal (5/8" OD) Compression Inlet x 3/8" OD Compression Outlet Shut-off Valve Plumbing(VALVE116-10Pack)
short_description: Long-Lasting:Angle stop valve is made of lead free brass and a chrome-plated finish,which is resists corrosion and rust.And uniform Plumbing Code (UPC) Certified and Approved,that comply with drinking water standard.
Connection Size:Inlet Connection: 5/8" compression fits 1/2" pipes.Outlet Connection: 3/8" compression fits 3/8" water hose for toilets and faucets.
Product Compatible:GUOFIS angle shut-off valve are compatible with copper or Pex Water Pipes,also available in Pex Valve.Easy to install on the pipe supply lines for toilets and faucets.

name: Xiny Tool Garden Hose Shut Off Valve, 3/4 Inch Heavy Duty Solid Brass Garden Hose Connector, Water Shut Off Valve with 2 Extra Rubber Washers
short_description: Package Includes: Including 1 x 3/4 inch brass garden hose shut off valve, 2 x extra washers

Heavy-Duty Brass: Made from solid brass, these garden hose shut-off valves are built for maximum durability and reliability. The brass material ensures leak-proof performance, rust resistance, and long-lasting use

Universal Compatibility: These shut-off valves feature a standard 3/4-inch thread, fitting any garden hose, faucet, or watering device with a 3/4-inch connection. They are compatible with most standard garden hoses and connectors

Easy to Use: Designed with a user-friendly twist mechanism, these shut-off valves allow you to easily control water flow with just a simple turn. The ergonomic design makes them easy to operate, ensuring smooth and convenient use.

Versatility: The 3/4 inches water hose shut off valve can be applied on many occasions such as garden hoses, watering device pressure washers, RVs, campers, boats, faucets, lawn sprinklers, water nozzles, spigots, and other garden accessories
